title: Phase 8: Polish & Deploy
description: Performance optimization (texture compression, object pooling). Store preparation (icons, screenshots, descriptions). Deploy to Google Play and App Store.

title: Phase 2.3: Migrate Logic (TDD)
description: Migrate 4 logic files: Spline.cs, SplinePoint.cs, LevelLogic.cs, TileInfo.cs

title: Phase 3.2: Migrate ProjectMercury Emitters
description: Migrate emitter classes: Emitter, CircleEmitter, ConeEmitter, LineEmitter, MaskEmitter, RectEmitter, TextureEmitter, PolygonEmitter

title: Phase 2.2: Migrate Sprites (TDD)
description: Migrate 11 sprite files: ProgressBar, ComboText, AchievementEntry, LeaderboardEntry, etc.

title: Phase 1.1: Migrate Constants (TDD)
description: Migrate 6 constant files to HamstasKitties.Constants namespace with TDD approach and 80% test coverage

title: Phase 2: Shared Code Migration
description: Port platform-independent game logic to shared project. Key files: Block.cs (1412 lines), LevelBoardController.cs (718 lines), MatchingGroup.cs, ComboManager.cs, PhysicsEngine.cs, GameStateManager.cs. Apply DI pattern, remove conditionals, write comprehensive tests.

title: Phase 1.4: Fix Interface Return Types (TDD)
description: Fix ITouchableContainer return types in Scene.cs and Director.cs

title: Phase 3.1: Migrate ProjectMercury Core
description: Migrate core particle engine: Particle.cs, ParticleEffect.cs, ParticleEffectManager.cs, SpriteBatchRenderer.cs, Renderer.cs

title: Phase 1.3: Migrate Social folder (TDD)
description: Migrate 5 Social/Achievements/Gaming files with TDD and 80% coverage

title: Critical: Migrate GameDirector and fix ambiguous refs
description: Migrate GameDirector.cs and fix ambiguous Timer/Texture/IUpdateable references

title: Phase 1.2: Migrate SoundPushButton (TDD)
description: Migrate SoundPushButton.cs to Extras/ with TDD and 80% coverage

title: Phase 0: Project Setup
description: Create new solution structure with SDK-style .csproj, set up .NET 8, configure CI/CD, create CHANGELOG.md

title: Phase 7: Testing & QA
description: Achieve 80%+ test coverage. Unit tests for core logic (90%), services (85%), UI (70%). Integration tests. Manual testing checklist. Performance testing (60fps, <200MB memory).

title: Phase 3.4: Migrate BlockEmitters
description: Migrate BlockEmitter and mode-specific emitters: ClassicModeBlockEmitter, CountdownModeBlockEmitter, etc.

title: Phase 1: Core Abstractions
description: Extract platform-agnostic interfaces (ISoundManager, ISettingsManager, IAnalyticsService, IVibratorManager, INetworkManager, ILeaderboardService, IAchievementService, ITouchPanelService). Remove #if WINDOWS_PHONE conditionals. Create mock implementations.

title: Phase 4: Platform Projects
description: Create Android (API 24+) and iOS (12.0+) projects. Implement platform-specific services (Vibrator, TouchPanel). Handle lifecycle events. Test on physical devices.

title: Fix incomplete codebase migration - 171 build errors
description:
The migration from the original Android/iOS codebase to HamstasKitties.Shared is only ~50% complete. 171 build errors due to missing:
- ProjectMercury particle effects library
- GameModes/ folder (CountdownGameMode, etc.)
- Sprites/ folder
- Constants/GlobalConstants
- Extras/ folder  
- Social/ folder (Score, Leaderboard)
- Core classes: BlockEmitter, Spline, SoundPushButton, etc.
- Namespace mismatches and interface incompatibilities

title: Phase 1.5: Migrate Achievements (TDD)
description: Migrate 8 achievement type files with TDD and 80% coverage

title: Phase 3.3: Migrate ProjectMercury Modifiers
description: Migrate modifier classes: ColourModifier, OpacityModifier, ScaleModifier, LinearGravityModifier, etc.

title: HnK Port: MonoGame Modernization
description: Modernize Hamstas'n'Kitties from legacy Xamarin/MonoGame v3 to modern .NET 8/MonoGame with Firebase backend. Target: Android 7.0+, iOS 12.0+. TDD with 80%+ coverage.

title: Phase 5: Firebase Integration
description: Replace Scoreloop/Flurry with Firebase. Implement FirebaseAnalyticsService, FirestoreLeaderboardService, FirestoreCloudSaveService, HybridAchievementService. Test with Firebase Emulator.

title: Phase 2.5: Additional Animation Classes (TDD)
description: Migrate AnimatedLayerObject, FrameBasedAnimatedLayerObject, FadeDirectorTransition

title: Phase 2.1: Migrate GameModes (TDD)
description: Migrate 6 game mode files: Level.cs, ClassicMode.cs, CountdownMode.cs, ChilloutMode.cs, GoldRushMode.cs, MainMenuGameModesButtonsLayer.cs

title: Phase 3: UI Framework Migration
description: Modernize Scene/Layer system with DI. Migrate LayerObject, Layer, Scene, Button, Text, ListView components. Refactor Director pattern from singleton to DI. Migrate all game mode scenes and menu scenes.

title: Phase 2.4: Complete Tween/Easing (TDD)
description: Add TweenerCollection, TimerCollection, and all easing functions

title: Phase 6: Assets Migration
description: Create MonoGame content pipeline (Content.mgcb). Convert 150+ images, 38 sounds, 4 music tracks, sprite sheets, particle effects, fonts. Test loading on both platforms.
